news.title: Facebook Accused of Shutting Out Mobile Competitors in Lawsuit
news.description: Mobile app developers have filed a class-action lawsuit against Facebook alleging that the company revoked access to data in an attempt to stifle competition.

news.title: LinkedIn Brings 3 New Features to LinkedIn Pages
news.description: LinkedIn pages are gaining three new features: the ability to invite first-degree profile connections to follow, the ability to stream with LinkedIn Live, and the option to post as an individual or an organization.

news.title: Facebook is Banning Deepfake Videos
news.description: Facebook announced this month that it would ban "deepfakes", which are AI-manipulated videos that distort reality, and other heavily manipulated media.

news.title: Facebook is Preparing to Launch a Desktop Redesign to All Users
news.description: Facebook is reportedly planning to roll out a redesign of its desktop website to all users before this spring.
